": A smart whisk that can be programmed to mix different ingredients at different speeds and temperatures, ensuring perfect results every time. It also has a built-in timer and can be controlled via a mobile app."
"Whisk-o-Matic: A self-cleaning whisk that uses a special brush to clean itself after each use, making it a convenient and hassle-free option for busy cooks."

"Egg-Beater: A whisk that is specifically designed for beating eggs, with adjustable settings to ensure perfectly whipped egg whites or yolks. It also has a built-in timer and can be controlled via a mobile app."
"Micro: A compact and portable whisk that is perfect for travelers and busy cooks. It is made of durable materials and is easy to clean."
